name: TRA Input VAT Returns eFiling
query:
SELECT s.name                     AS "SUPPLIER_NAME:Link/Supplier:200",
       s.vrn                      AS "SUPPLIER_VRN::50", 
       pi.bill_no                 AS "TAX_INVOICE_NUMBER::50", 
       pi.bill_date               AS "DATE_OF_INVOICE:Date:120", 
       pi.remarks                 AS "ITEMS", 
       pi.base_net_total          AS "AMOUNT_VAT_EXCL:Currency:100", 
       pi.total_taxes_and_charges AS "VAT_AMT:Currency:100" 
FROM   `tabPurchase Invoice` pi 
       INNER JOIN `tabSupplier` s 
               ON pi.supplier = s.name 
WHERE  pi.total_taxes_and_charges != 0;
